bug.author: WreckItTim
bug.summary: ANN_MLP TermCriteria::COUNT will still terminate after default epsilon
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.4.2 and 4.0.1 Operating System / Platform => Mac 32 Bit and 64 Bit Compiler => Eclipse
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
When training an ANN_MLP, if you specify to terminate training after (cv::TermCriteria::COUNT) it will still terminate with (cv::TermCriteria::COUNT + cv::TermCriteria::EPS) using the default epsilon value. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
int nEpochs; double epsilon; cv::Ptr<cv::ml::ann_mlp> network = cv::ml::ANN_MLP::create(); network->setTermCriteria(cv::TermCriteria(cv::TermCriteria::COUNT, nEpochs, epsilon)); network->train(â€¦); This should terminate after nEpochs, however if the error drops below the default epsilon value, training will also terminate. The problem is first found here in source code, when defining epsilon: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/ml/src/ann_mlp.cpp#L867>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/ml/src/ann_mlp.cpp#L867</denchmark-link>
Then later here, when terminating the training loop: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/ml/src/ann_mlp.cpp#L949>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/modules/ml/src/ann_mlp.cpp#L949</denchmark-link>
I found this error when doing some benchmarks. I noticed after a certain amount of epochs, the training time would stagnate (it should increase when you increase the number of epochs). There is a work around, if you set term criteria to COUNT + EPS and define epsilon = 0: network->setTermCriteria(cv::TermCriteria(cv::TermCriteria::COUNT + cv::TermCriteria::EPS, nEpochs, 0)); However, according to the documentation, just using cv::TermCriteria::COUNT should suffice.

Or should we stop epsilon check in case of cv::TermCriteria::COUNT not being present?

epsilon would just have to revert to a default value of zero if the user specified COUNT <denchmark-link:#>â€¦</denchmark-link>
